titles.title: Expressing support for designation of September 2022 as "National Dystonia Awareness Month" and raising awareness and understanding of the disorder of dystonia.
Expressing support for designation of September 2022 as "National Dystonia Awareness Month" and raising awareness and understanding of the disorder of dystonia.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: This resolution supports designating National Dystonia Awareness Month. (Dystonia is a neurological disorder that is characterized by repetitive, involuntary muscle contractions.)
